member.name: M:PathingAPI.Controllers.PPatherController.MapRoute(System.Int32,System.Single,System.Single,System.Int32,System.Single,System.Single)
member.summary: Allows a route to be calculated from one point to another using minimap coords.
member.remarks:
map1 and map2 are the map ids. See https://wow.gamepedia.com/API_C_Map.GetBestMapForUnit
/dump C_Map.GetBestMapForUnit("player")
Dump: value=_Map.GetBestMapForUnit("player") [1]=1451
x and y are the map coordinates for the zone (same as the mini map). See https://wowwiki.fandom.com/wiki/API_GetPlayerMapPosition
local posX, posY = GetPlayerMapPosition("player");
member.returns: A list of x,y,z and mapid

member.name: M:PathingAPI.Controllers.PPatherController.WorldRoute(System.Single,System.Single,System.Single,System.Single,System.Single,System.Single,System.String)
member.summary: Allows a route to be calculated from one point to another using world coords. e.g. -896, -3770, 11, (Barrens,Rachet) to -441, -2596, 96, (Barrens,Crossroads,Barrens)

member.name: M:PathingAPI.WorldMapArea.Matches(PathingAPI.WorldMapArea,System.String[])
member.summary: Fix occurance where Stormwind and Stormwind city didn't match

member.name: T:WowTriangles.PriorityQueueItem`2
member.summary: Represents an item stored in a priority queue.
member.typeparam: The type of object in the queue.
The type of the priority field.

member.name: P:WowTriangles.PriorityQueueItem`2.Value
member.summary: Gets the value of this PriorityQueueItem.

member.name: P:WowTriangles.PriorityQueueItem`2.Priority
member.summary: Gets the priority associated with this PriorityQueueItem.

member.name: T:WowTriangles.PriorityQueue`2
member.summary: Represents a binary heap priority queue.
member.typeparam: The type of object in the queue.
The type of the priority field.

member.name: M:WowTriangles.PriorityQueue`2.Peek
member.returns: The object at the beginning of the queue.

member.name: M:WowTriangles.PriorityQueue`2.Clear
member.summary: Removes all objects from the queue.

member.name: M:WowTriangles.PriorityQueue`2.TrimExcess
member.summary: Sets the capacity to the actual number of elements in the Queue, if that number is less than 90 percent of current capacity.

member.name: M:WowTriangles.PriorityQueue`2.Contains(`0)
member.summary: Determines whether an element is in the queue.
member.param: The object to locate in the queue.
member.returns: True if item found in the queue. False otherwise.
